MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a fault with the power in the CH47 postcode area of Meols. This is causing flickering power to a number of properties. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 4:33PM. Our next available engineer will attend site to investigate and our team will work to get your power back to normal as quickly and as safely as possible by 8:00PM. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 5:20PM on 20th January 2021.
